subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jerry Reese made his first bold moves as general manager of the Giants Monday, cutting three injury-plagued veterans — offensive tackle Luke Petitgout and outside linebackers LaVar Arrington and Carlos Emmons.
snippet: Jerry Reese made his first bold moves as general manager of the Giants Monday, cutting three injury-plagued veterans — offensive tackle Luke Petitgout and outside linebackers LaVar Arrington and Carlos Emmons.
